Enumeration# UIMenuSystem.ElementGroupPreference

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
enum ElementGroupPreference
```

## [Topics](/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/ElementGroupPreference#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/ElementGroupPreference#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case automatic`](/documentation/uikit/uimenusystem/elementgrouppreference/automatic)The default preference. The element group is automatically included based on the platform and other system behaviors.[`case included`](/documentation/uikit/uimenusystem/elementgrouppreference/included)Prefer that the element group is included.[`case removed`](/documentation/uikit/uimenusystem/elementgrouppreference/removed)Prefer that the element group is removed.### [Initializers](/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuSystem/ElementGroupPreference#Initializers)
